Boss Drop Calculator

Info:
Here you can calculate how much you gain from a boss.
Ex) Boss has 5,000 health and drops 250 gold and I deal 2.5k damage in 2 seconds. I kill the boss in 4 seconds, meaning I get 250/4 gold per second (62.5).
This takes into consideration the 5 seconds after a fight, invite time (2 seconds), and if you instantly kill the boss, but not travel time. Some bosses also have extra time added to them because it's either random how long it takes or is a immune phase. For bosses that take 1 damage, Damage should be how many times you hit, otherwise it'll just be a instant kill and be in-accurate.

Damage in seconds
